CustomField.description: Defines the agent who holds this specialization. This master-detail relationship links each specialization entry to a specific agent, ensuring that all related specializations are managed under the agentâ€™s ownership and follow their sharing and lifecycle rules.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the agent who this specialization belongs to. Each record must be associated with one agent to define their areas of expertise.
CustomField.label: Agent
